text: Earthy Love () is a 1974 Soviet drama movie directed by Yevgeny Matveyev.Любовь земная. Евгений Матвеев боготворил женщин, но 56 лет прожил с однойЛЮБОВЬ ЗЕМНАЯ (1974) It stars Yevgeny Matveyev, Zinaida Kiriyenko, and Yury Yakovlev. ==Actors== * Yevgeny Matveyev as Zakhar Deriugin * Zinaida Kiriyenko as Efrosinya * Yury Yakovlev as Tikhon * Valeriya Zaklunna as Katerina * Olga Ostroumova as Manya * Irina Skobtseva as Elizaveta Polivanova * Viktor Khokhryakov as Chubarov * Vladimir Samoilov as Rodion Anisimov * Stanislav Chekan as Koshev == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian romance movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:1974 romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yevgeny Matveyev Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Earthly Love
